page.title: 16SCIENTOLOGY
page.content: A religious sect, founded in 1954 by american R Hubbard, the Church of Scientology, has its headquarters at Saint Hill Manor, a secluded country estate on the edge of East Grinstead. Over 400 adults study courses on spiritual counselling, management technology and self improvement, which they believe enables them to get more out of life. What is Scientology? They believe "Man is regarded as a spiritual being and once he is understood in this light, his life & abilities are improved by helping him become more aware of his true nature. Scientology has severe critics in many countries as experts feel it can adversely affect the mental health of students.The sect has been banned in several countries and a ban on foreign Scientology students entering the United Kingdom is still in force.
